item_category: This camera phone is perfect for anyone who prefers a wider display when messaging or viewing photos. Three direct keys take you right to the phone's messaging function, handy torch or easy to use camera. Take photos in a snap, and enjoy easier texting and dialling thanks to the widely spaced, convex keys. Also has FM radio for your listening pleasure, and an assistance button for greater peace of mind.

review_text: Bought a month ago, excellent.
Bought this for a friend of mine whose in his mid eighties, he's thrilled with it
Has removed all my dads frustrations with his previous smart phone which he just could not use in the end due to his health condition
So happy with the purchase would definitely recommend to anyone
My husband couldn’t get away with using a Smart phone so reverted back to a normal one this suits him better for just calls and texts camera ok too

This was a new phone for my 85 year old father, it is better than the old one its been updated with better features ,my dad is not good with anything technical he's has poor sight and going deaf but this seemed to work well with his needs it has large buttons, speaker, torch, camera very easy to use and once it was set up was great for him.
Great phone for helping people learn
I bought this phone for my husband aged 65 as it has bigger button's and is easy to use
Bought this for my elderly Mum, her 1st mobile! So easy to set up, sim free, so I was able to get a cheap annual sim card online for light use. Perfect for emergencies which is all we wanted.
Good size of phone for older people/hard of hearing, purchased mainly for emergencies
I bought this on June first and the screen cracked on June twenty third
Clear easy to read buttons. Simple to use. Great battery life  Exactly what was needed.
Easy to use replacement phone for doro phone  simple to use set up great for children for calls only or elderly

Purchased for my elderly father. He doesn’t want or need a smart phone. It has quite a few features but to be honest he just wants it for making and receiving calls. 
Works really well for him using EE network

Bought for my 92 year old Mum who has had to move into a nursing home. The phone is a decent size , easy to set up and keeps its charge well . Making and taking calls easy to do and the loud speaker facility is great for the user with hearing loss . I got a my mum  a £5 per month unlimited calls and texts on a rolling 30 day contract with talk mobile . Brilliant .

I bought this for my mother who is in her late 80s. She isn't good with any form of technology including simple things like a television. I wouldn't say she took to it like a duck to water but she managed to remember how to use it the day after I showed her. It is a really basic phone and I didn't go into things like photos or text messages. She can make and receive phone calls so I'd definitely recommend this for technophobes.
I bought this for my 86 year old mum who is in hospital. It is simple and easy to use and has been a lifeline for her.
Bought for my husband who had problem using his smartphone. Simple to use and has a good camera. Good purchase for those people only wanting to make calls and texts.

I ordered this on my (technology illiterate) father's behalf as my Nan was in hospital recently. He was able to collect it just fine without me having to be there with him so we're grateful for that, and as far as I'm aware my Nan has no problems using it. Thanks very much :)
This is the perfect easy to use phone without being a smart phone. Good size. Easy to see buttons and functionality. All round bigger than it’s predecessor.

Easy to order and collect. The phone is of a reasonable easy to handle size for my elderly parents and easy to use. The plug in charger is a little awkward for elderly, I fee the connection could be damaged quite easily. Plus point is long battery life.

Easy to use  especially for pensioners who find smartphones difficult to understand and use 
Bought this for my uncle
Bought as a replacement for old phone that doesn't  except new sim cards

Would like a better display of battery state but otherwise an excellent for anyone who wants a basic phone with a clear, easy to read display. Very easy to use and has a camera and torch. I particularly like the scroll button - just up or down to scroll through options.
Great mobile phone very easy to use, able to see the letters and numbers as they are slightly larger than normal.
Easy to use and good quality phone
It's easy to use, clear numbers and not too complicated if you just need a simple phone for whatever reason.
Phone is easy to use as buttons are quite big because of the width of the phone. It looks good and screen size is good. I'm happy with it.

Bought this for my aged mum. It's simple to use and with big buttons and large text ideal for sight impairment.
Assistance button is a bonus for when she is out in case of emergency.
Excellent value for what we needed.
a smooth transition with no worries for mum.

Bought this for my 78 yr old Mum who’s not technically minded at all, she finds it very easy to use and navigate around the settings. 
I would recommend.
Bought for my elderly mother who has struggled with new phones and it is perfect. Straightforward and easy to use.

I bought this to replace my old Doro clamshell style phone I'd had for 7 years. I was tempted to go for the updated version but wanted a change. However I was disappointed that the volume is not as loud as my old one, the font size is smaller, and I find the white on black text difficult to read. The torch which was the deciding factor is likewise disappointing.

I bought this phone for my father who is End of Days. He could no longer operate his smart phone. He needed to communicate with family and this basic mobile phone has enabled us to talk to him. Simple to use answer with the green button end with the red. Incredibly simple to program in numbers and a very easy to see screen. Battery life is outstanding over a week. There is even a camera too, basic but does the job. Highly recommend this basic phone.
These phones are ideal for the elderly as there easy to use and numbers/letters are clear to see.

Very pleased with this phone. Bought it to replace an old first generation small phone. This Doro has larger buttons and screen and is much easier to use. Adjustable volume makes it easy to hear. Has a 3Mp camera. Only downside is that it can't be plugged into my computer to transfer photos. Can insert a micro SD card in order to save and export photos. Battery charge life is excellent.
(The phone gets a 'Which' best buy rating).

Superb for the older user.
If you just want to phone, text and take pics. You can't beat it. So simple to use and big enough to see
Good phone for calls and messaging.  Buttons are large and bright. The phone is a nice size to hold and keep in pocket.
This phone is ideal for someone who doesn't want a smart phone and is of the older generation. It has a bright screen, feels good to hold and an easy to understand quick startup leaflet.
Great little phone for the hard of hearing very compact and easy to use
Bought for my mother going into a hospice. Basic enough to be able to call out on it and answer.
I bought this for my daughter who has special needs. It was easy to set up and she finds it easy to use.

Bought for elderly relative. Not always been a fan of Doro phones, a bit fiddly for a phone targeted at the elderly market.  Attempting to access the internet on my mother's old phone was a massive waste of time; not worth the bother. Smart phones I found much more intuitive.  Which is bizarre, given the intended market.  However, I found this phone much improved over past models, it feels much more streamlined.  It has brilliant short cut keys. The internet is ignored; not a bad move.

Basic large button phone for elderly parents. Very simple to use and set up, you can even remove confusing features and set an emergency one touch call option Only issue was getting info on which sim would work, got one on EE in the end but others that offer 2G will do too.

I would definitely recommend the doro to anyone, young or older who is looking for a great quality functional phone, but is on a bit of a budget.this phone can also send picture messages which is a fantastic bonus. Quality feel, and overall much more than what I was expecting for the price.
Easy to use especially for elderly people simple instructions
Perfect Mobile Phone for an elderly person.
My mum needed a new phone with bigger keys and screen ,we've always bought the Doro flip phones but  but this graphite SIM free phone was perfect,not too big for her grip and easy to use
This phone has met all of the requirements that my elderly Father needs. He was able to keep in touch with me whilst he was in hospital. Easy to set up and easy to use
I would not recomend this phone for a elderly person, you can buy a less button punching phone that would be easier.
Feels good, looks good, easy to use.
I purchased the phone for my husband. We are both very pleased with it. Simple to set up and use. Many different features. Would definitely recommend.

Bought this for my partner who struggled with her smart phone. Very simple to use, with the presets she just presses nought and it dials straight through to me. Nothing fancy on it it just does the job and does it well.
I had never heard of this brand but I chose it because of the reviews. Very happy with it. Battery holds charge well. Easy for a novice to use.
The phone was purchased for an elderly  frail lady  who wanted something easy to use, it's perfect.
This is a useful phone for an elderly person. It would be helpful if the basic instructions were in larger print.
Got phone for my 81 year old dad he loves it easy to use big numbers and loud speaker the best phone he's ever had excellent buy
Very happy with the purchase of my phone I will keep shopping with Argos you do a good job at these difficult times thank you
Nice big numbers nice big print on screen perfect for the old folk so easy to use also has quite a loud ring tone too ...... perfect

I bought this for my 93yr old mother who needed a big button mobile as she suffers with crippling arthritis in her hands. She is able to push the buttons but I had to purchase a non slip case to stop it from slipping through her tiny hands. All ok now. Simple phone to use and does the job

Bought for my 90 year old mother.  Have programmed my number into button 0 so that she can just press that without doing anything else to contact me. Just needs to keep it charged. There is an emergency button on the back which can be set up to text five people in turn until one replies.  Size of the text on the screen can be set to large so it’s easy to read. Functions easy to navigate and use.   Have set volume to highest but mum still has difficulty hearing when using it.
Easy to handle and use
Easy to use, nice big buttons.

This is the 3rd Doro phone I have purchased for my elderly relatives to call and speak with family and friends. Relatives who cannot or refuse to use a smartphone touchscreen. Does exactly what mobile phones were originally introduced for "talking to people" :-)
It’s a very good easy to use phone
Neat & light easy to use
Bought this for my Grandad and it has been great, easy to use with big buttons. Now he can call us anytime :D
Yes I bought  it for my sister as a present. She is 72 . So for her it fulfills  her needs phoning people and answering her calls.
It was easy to locate my product and it was also very simple to pay and collect my product from the store in wick
Great starter phone for an elderly person. Large buttons, simple tones, easy to use. Has a camera and a torch button. It does not work on network Three, the carrier must support a 2G network.

I brought this phone for my elderly mother, as her previous iPhone was too complex for her, I set up the star button for her with family contacts, much easier for her to use, good value for the money,
Much easier numbers for my 78 old mum ho use
Would recommend this product. Easy to use and set uo
Great phone but don’t understand after one photo memory full. Can’t find any help why
My grandma had one of these phones for years and it’s finally given up but it’s so easy to use we bought her another one to replace it. It gives us peace of mind with the safety button on the back.
I bought this simple Doro mobile for my 96 year old aunty. Once she's found the Speak On button it's all good! Necessary because her landline is so useless!
It’s a very easy phone to use. The screen is clear and easy to read. It’s very good.
All good...price. Service. Product
Service good and fast for collection in-store and phone as described on the website.
Excellent big buttons and clear screen.if you don't want smartphone I can recommend that one

Very simple phone, ideally for someone who simply want to make call and read the occasional text.  Text size option is great as is the ring volume which you can set easily.  On a separate note, I ordered a SIM card to come with the phone, but it never arrived, so had to get another SIM car from the Supermarket.

Very disappointing. It takes at least 6 keystrokes to call anyone in the phone book. Yes there is quick dial but this requires a long depression of the right key. My 91 year old mother in law struggles with this and if she ever presses the wrong key she’s lost.
What really old people need is a phone that is switched on with one key depression and ring somebody with the next. They don’t want Texts, alarms, torches, radios, cameras etc.
I just needed a phone for a 93 year old. This one does the job OK.
Bought this as an emergency phone. Only downside was that it was not sim free. Had to get an ee sim as it did not recognise a three sim.
It’s a very good phone for the price.
In general i really don't have any problems with i buy from argos. Fast service and quick pick up. Great site to purchase stuff
For my mother in law. Very easy keypad, easy to see and use.

I purchased the phone for my 83 year old mum who is delighted with it and finds it very easy to use. She can even add her own contacts. 

Thank you

Ordered the mobile for my elderly mum. Incredible easy to use great value and all she needs to make calls and text. Ordered on line and collected at local store all within 2 hours. 
Great service.

A usefully designed basic mobile phone, ideal for my elderly father.
We like the balance of screen size, number/key pad and the extra features such as the shortcut keys. The menu navigation can be a little frustrating, but in time with practice it will be fine. The speaker and ringer volumes are good, but not especially loud, so someone really hard of hearing may struggle.
Seems to hold its charge well and is quick to charge.
Simple and easy to use.
Easy to use for the non techno individual
Charging is good. Easily carried and good quality. Happy with mh purchase.
Easy to use, green and red button visible. Charging cable has a tumb grip to make it easy to slot in and out.
Good large screen. Very basic mobile. Great for my elderly mother-in-law to use.
Bought for my mother to replace an older phone. Easy to use. Would recommend.
Ideal works display is a bit bigger than previous model I much approve the bigger its so much easier to use its slightly wider too.
Bought for a 70 year old who'd had trouble with smart phones. This has been the perfect solution and he's much happier with all its functions. The star key, for favourite contacts, is a real bonus.
Bought for a relative that struggles with technology. Simple to set up , easy to see ,use and loud enough.
Bought on behalf of an elderly person to replace a similar model from the same manufacturer.  Easy for them to use and audio quality is much improved

I purchased this phone for my 79 year old mother. She just needed a phone to make and receive calls and this is perfect. No complicated setup. She is able to navigate the names button to find her contacts. The arrows on the front can be used for navigating or turning the volume up or down. It's a nice size too. Well done Doro!!

The Doro 1370 is a basic, simple to use phone, just for calls & texts. Good for older people who don't want to get involved with a smartphone! It doesn't seem to last for ever (my husband has had three in two years), but at least it's cheap to replace and you just put your SIM card in & it's ready to go.
Just wright for my husband, nice and easy to use. Good value.
Very easy to use with simple access to all features and clear screen display of functions as they are selected. Ideal device if phoning, SMS and photos are the required uses.
Simple use and functions
I would recommend this mobile for anyone over the age of 70 as easy to use. Large buttons and simple instructions for my mother to understand. Also easy to order and collect quickly.

Easy to use
Large buttons
Great phone if you want to just make calls ideally phones for the elderly person. The phone has large buttons.
Great sized phone for older people. Clear screen, large font, easy to use, green to go and red to stop. Good battery life and simple to charge.
Basic but does what I needed it for.  Texts and talking.

Basic (non-smart) phone with good screen and plenty of features without the complications of internet updates and other money-wasting activities, so very suitable for pay-as-you-go (or contract if preferred). Does what it says on the tin; very pleased with it.

Bought for my Mum who is 81. Was easy to set up and she soon got the hang of how to use it. 
Good large screen, so easy to read. Would definitely recommend

Got  phone  for disable mother  who  has  limited  vision big  buttons  and large text ,just one  problem  the  
Plug  which goes  in phone needs to indicate  which  way round  it goes  in, maybe  colour one side with bright colour, and make a rough side .

Bought this as a gift for mum for Christmas. Great looking phone, simple and ideal for anyone not tech-savvy, however, this wouldn't work for for us, despite us having a new 2G sim card sent from the phone company. Unfortunately had to return this item.....
My wife wanted a basic phone because she doesn't like Android and only wanted to make and receive calls and texts. This phone is easy to use and we are more than happy with it.
Good phone simple for a senior to use.
Simple format, easy to navigate big buttons make it easier to read

When my wife's smartphone died an unrecoverable death we needed an urgent replacement but didn't have the funds for an all singing and dancing internet contactable phone so she bought this as a stop gap.
She loves it, the Doro is so simple and straight forward like the original mobiles of many moons ago but offering so much more.

Got this phone for my elderly mum who can’t use anything too technical! All she needs a phone for is making calls and sending texts and taking a few pics. Phone easy to use, nice big keys and easy to read text. Very easy to set up. Only glitch we found is after taking a few pics the phone said memory full and couldn’t take anymore. We turned phone off and on again and could then take more pics! The picture quality not the best but is ok. Price paid for the phone it is good value.

This SIM Free Doro 1370 Mobile Phone in White, is very good, easy for me to use
at 94 Years old.
Very good value for money.
Bought this for dad who can hardly see,he has found how to text which he couldn't do on his other phone and ring easily,he is most happy with it,..loud sound and zoom up screen would buy again
Easy and simple to use. I found this is just what I needed. Very happy with this product. Good value and no fancy bits to confuse me.
Exellent , mother in law found it easy to use it has bigger letters
very happy with this item and would recommend this item10/10
Got it for my wife great big numbers clear screen easy to use

Bought this for my 88 year old mother who was still using her beloved Nokia 6300 and was adamant she didn't want a smart phone.  She seems to have got the hang of it really quickly but is upset it doesn't have a stopwatch and timer.  It's got nice big buttons and is easy to use with a camera and reasonably sized screen.  While I wouldn't put it past her to get upset with it because it's new, so far, so good. I set the phone up and I think she would have struggled as the instructions are not good
simple no frills phone
It’s easy to use, good clear display, loud ring, excellent camera too.
does what it purports to do - simple and clear to use
Excellent and very good price
Great phone bought it for my mother easy to use and set up brillant

My elderly aunt finds this phone very easy to use.  The large buttons are very helpful, there are a variety of ringtones to choose from and loud enough for her to hear as she has hearing difficulties.
Bought for my Mum and she now prefers using it to the landline. Loud and clear and easy to navigate, and dedicated torch button, which I could do with on my smartphone.
Very reasonably priced, my mother finds it easy to use

Simple for using . My dad is not very good in using phone but this can use easily.
If the keyboard will be a little bigger , the phone will be amazing.
Clear display, easy to use keyboard and great value at Argos
Got for elderly person easy to use with big buttons, bonus having camera as well

First phone failed by only storing up to 12 texts then finally failed to send texts. Replacement works well, text storage said to be about 100. Easy to use, especially if predictive text turned off. Buttons very clear and positive. Good for basic phone use, but does not do social media, just basic.

If you want a phone only to send and receive good, clear voice mail, or listen to voice, but not music on the FM radio (you have to buy your own earphones, they are not provided) this will be a good phone for you.  If you want to take photographs with its very reasonable camera, or send and receive texts, buy something else - this phone has almost zero storage so your phone list plus a couple of texts result in the message "Memory full", and you cannot open or send texts or take photographs.

THIS PHONE IS SUITABLE FOR PERSONS THAT USE THE PHONE FOR RECIEVE AND SEND CALLS 
DO NOT NEED MORE THAN THAT IT IS VERY GOOD VALUE FOR MINIMUM USE
Jus the job - as a replacement for elderly ladies mobile phone
Partner is happy with it easy to use and just what he wanted
Excellent phone, easy to use for an 85 year old.  I think number pad could be slightly larger but that's more a personal preference than a design flaw l, hence the 5 stars.
This phone was bought for my 80 year old grandad who doesn’t need an all singing all dancing phone. This phone is ideal for him.
He is so happy with the bigger buttons on his new phone. It is very easy for him to use. I'm happy as I know he's safe he has had several falls this year.
Easy use for simple option. Volume is easy to understand.
a very neat phone easy to use
Read the leaflet carefully and charge battery before use
Can’t get my head round it
Great for people on a budget.
Very easy to use. Good volume for calls , perfect budget phone for the hard of hearing
Which? reviewed this as a "Best Buy" and I agree.
Excellent mobile for what my wife wanted.phone calls and texts.

If you want a more basic phone with no internet connection then this is an ideal phone. I do not need the internet on a mobile so I chose the Doro and I am very impressed with it. It looks and feels nice and it is easy to use, I am very impressed with it for the price.

I bought the phone for a friend who has mild learning difficulties. Who finds a regular mobile to difficult to understand. I programmed the numbers she needs and taught her the basics. She's now able to use it after a couple of days. 
So yes I'd recommend this phone.
good size and weight. nice bright screen

i purchased a simple easy to use phone for my wife , we are both very pleased with this phone.. Its a basic phone , which is what she wanted. Its very simple to use with large keys, We both find it ideal and very simple to use. I am now thinking about getting a spare phone for myself in case of my regular phone breaking down. 10 / 10

Phone is great. My wife has one.
 I have a 3 Pay As You Go sim from my old phone but this phone would not connect to their network. A quick online search turns up that this is correct. I've now gone to CoOp mobile (EE) and all is well.

This phone is perfect for the older person 
Nice and simple to set up and very user friendly, nice clear button display and a very clear on screen functions

I bought this phone for my dad - it's simple to use, with a large screen, chunky buttons and clear menu. It even comes with a proper old-fashioned instruction leaflet - great! The only feature we couldn't find was a hands-free option which would have been useful for him.
I also got this phone for an elderly lady who was afraid of falling whilst in her garden - the assistance button has really put her mind at rest. A very good buy!
A good, basic mobile phone very simplistic and easy to use. Would recommend it for all 'tech phobes'!
Bought this for my husband who only needs to call&receive, also to text and receive, battery life is very good, all in all great phone

The phone was delivered very quickly and at a competitive price. Does what I want. I can't comment on the battery life as I have only had it a short time, but calls and texting seem easy enough. My old SIM card did not fit, but I was not aware that there were different sizes. Easy enough to get a new one.
This is a great introductory phone for anyone who hasn't used a mobile before.

.......quite honestly because they are excellent simple phones for elderly relatives, or anyone who wants a simple phone (not a smartphone,no internet capability). Screen text is large and easy to see, the buttons are easy to see and use.  Excellent value for money; there are cheaper versions of these Doro phones but they're not worth it.

Bought this 4 my 82yr old Mum, she had a Nokia that was on it's way out .. i was v pleased that most features worked in a v similar (if not exactly the same) way, Mum now loves it afta a week or so of gettin used 2 it .. u can freeze some features if not required, handset is larger & gud 4 arthritic hands .. she can hear it better 2, & can now take calls which was not poss on old handset 4a variety of reasons .. can strongly recommend :)
Cheap and cheerful,  happy with it

Good mobile phone but I have found that the battery life is definitely Not as good as per manufactures specks, the true life of the battery is more like 3 hours speech time & 48 hours standby time, it does Not connect to the Internet & is a very basic phone if that is what you are looking for...
Great for technophobe easy to use.
Nice phone and very easy to use.i recommend it 100%
This phone is fun and easy to use . Looks good and is compact .

An excellent phone for elders
Simple clear answer good value 
With a tremendous battery 

Go for it
A VERY GOOD PHONE FOR THE PAYED
This phone is an upgrade to her previous Doro. It's easy to use but this one has a camera.

no-frills .perfect for calls and texts with a speaker phone.has a built-in organizer which helps to remind me of specific to-do tasks.good for storing contacts mobile,home and office numbers all in one place.

I bought this model for my elderly father who wears a hearing aid and has arthritis in his hands. It is perfect on both counts. Easy to use and with clear adjustable sound levels. Would highly recommend.

This phone is ideal for my elderly Mum. It replaced a Doro flip phone that she’s had for ages but died. This has the same menu as the previous phone but a larger screen and bigger keys that are easier for her to manage as her sight is poor. She’s back texting again at the age of 90!

Very pleased. Bought this to replace a small 10 year old mobile. It is an improvement - I chose white which makes the black keys stand out. Also like the larger keys and screen compared to the old mobile. The phone has a camera. Bought a micro SD card for storage.
One minor disappointment is that the user guide says the phone can be connected to my computer using the USB socket, but I cannot find a socket on the phone. Therefore will have to remove the SD card (and battery) to print the photos.
Easy to use and sturdy

This phone is way to use   Bigger buttons are ideal for my elderly Dad 
A good phone for making and receiving calls and texting 
Good value for money
Brought  this for a family  member  who isn't into technology. I set it up for them, super easy..actually  not much to setup  other then transferring contact across. Can't complain it does the job

Great buttoned phone for those who don't want a smartphone.It has the option for a large font menu which is awesome.You have a voice message option for those who don't want or can write texts.When you press any button to see your clock it tells you to unlock and it remains on this screen until you unlock. First use and batery lasted for a FULL WEEK . Even though it was delivered 8 pm I found it in front on my neighborat 11 pm.

So I have literally went through about 10 maybe 15 of these Doro 1370 phones and everyone has some soft of software issues. The design of the phone and it's features are the best out there, the screen is perfect too. The only downside is here seems to be software issues. Things like switching itself of when sending a text. This phone has great potential however the software needs looking at by the manufacturer, and I'm sure it's not just me, in fact m sure.
very easy for my elderly relative to use.

I got this phone for an elderly relative as they are uncomfortable with "new" technology but realise the importance of being able to keep in touch. The phone does exactly what is needed ie make calls and sends texts. No fancy smart phone but a great phone for the price.

Great phone if it worked properly but after following the instructions to the letter the battery when left on standby after a couple of hours ran out, so no use for my 75 year old husband who needed it in case of an emergency
It was fur my husband who is computer illiterate. Took a day or so for him to get used to it. Very pleased.

Bought for my elderly father. Excellent value for money, design and use is excellent especially for the elderly . Having ICE installed is also excellent has you put details of your illnesses etc , so helps emergency services etc if anything happens . Easy to set up and use. Highly recommend.
Got this for my mum as her very old phone would no longer work on her virgin media SIM card. It’s great, easy to use, the text is bold and easy to see. Would recommend for a more mature generation.
Hopeless keypad lock does not work very well put it in your pocket and soon it starts phoning by its self would not recommend.

Good phone for the elderly. Easy to read screen and find phone numbers. 

Very light and has large easy to use buttons.

I bought this for my elderly mother after her previous handset needed upgrading due to the Virgin sim swap (previous handset very old).  Phone is nice a clear and took the new simm straight away.  Its a basic, but intuitive phone and my mother has got to grips with it quickly.  Good sound, clear display, easy to set up and use, nice big buttons.  Perfect for my requirements.

This is as good a basic phone as I can find - very few others seem to have contrasting numbers and background. 
It is a great shame that a charging cradle seems not to be available even from the manufacturer. 
The phone seems intended for simplicity of use but the only means of charging is a rather fiddly plug in cable rather than a much simpler to use cradle.
A potentially great product spoilt.
Messages is very hard to do
Bought for wife, doesn’t get on with new technology. This phone is so easy to use. She just wanted a phone, ideal !!!
I bought this for my mother in law  who is 80,she took to it straight away and loves it .i would recommend this phone.

I needed a new stand-by 'phone to keep in the car after a SIM upgrade from my mobile provider "bricked" my trusty old £10 Nokia. It had to be simple to use in the event of a car breakdown, or flat smart-phone battery, and cheap enough not to matter if lost or snatched.
This Doro 1370 at a special offer price was ideal. I particularly liked the large buttons and clear screen display. Battery life is extremely good - you can forget where you left the charger ! I recommend it for technophobes.
It is simple and straightforward, easy to use, looks good,too.  My wife wants one now!

It’s not an all singing dancing iphone. It’s an inexpensive, very easy to use phone, for older people who just want to call or text people. Functions are accessed by single buttons, rather than navigating menus, or trying to use multi function toggle buttons. The keypad is very clear and the emergency call button on rear of phone could be extremely useful for a lot of vulnerable people. Excellent.
This phone is a good size, has large buttons and simple to use. It was purchased for an 87 year old and she has no problem with it. Buying it from Argos was hassle free.
Avery good basic phone and easy to use.
Bought for a friend who can only use one hand since having a stroke. Basic phone which is easy for him to use.
It was exactly what I needed bigger lettering and easy to use
An excellent basic mobile phone. I can’t fault it, but make sure you get a suitable SIM card.
Bought for husband to use for work easy to use good price
Really good no probs so easy to use absolute cracking for the money and unbelievable ease of use
Cheap basic phone for a elderly relative who just needs to make and receive a call but must say quite a good few features camera torch really a good cheap phone
Ideal for gran and grandad so easy to use

Good phone. Long battery life, clear calls easy to read screen.
Does what is supposed to take/make phone calls and text messages.
Easy to use, I like the large text.
Great phone, easy to use and very loud which is what was wanted- also great price
Bought this phone for a elderly uncle who has problem with technology. But found this phone easy to use. Just wish it had game's on.
Super fast and easy to use. It is worth the small amount of money you pay for the features you receive with the phone
An amazing phone. Good stuff and value for money. My 81 year father is loving it. Been recommending it to friends, now am recommending it to you too. You will thank me later

I had to get an identical phone for my husband as I could not go into the care home to visit so could not show him how it would work. I had to put all the numbers in for him but everything else transferred. He was only without a phone for a day so it was all done very promptly.
My relative was pleased with it

I am so pleased with this phone, good value, design, features and easy to use, ideal for those who do not need or want a smart phone, The only difficulty was trying to insert the tiny sim card, once this was achieved, no problems.
Bought for my elderly dad he loves it
Good phone for the elderly
Highly delighted with my phone

This was a replacement as my dads last doro the speaker had gone, but it had it for years , so due a new one. 
My dad likes the phone, big keys, and texts. Does everything he needs it to do.

Bought this phone for my 
Dad. The camera does not work. Will be returning it for a refund.
Replacement for the same phone which my father in law used for years. He is 82 and finds this an easy phone to use.
This was bought for my mother as the original one i got her the keys were too small. This is just right and not complicated to use.
This phone is nice and easy to use , with straight forward features.
I wanted a simple phone that just handles calls and texts - the Doro 1370 fits this requirement perfectly. It does have a camera but the quality is acceptable only.

I just want a basic phone without knobs and whistles, and with a text size that I can read. This phone allows you to change the text size from medium to large - brilliant !!! The menus are easy to learn, the buttons are easy to use, very uncomplicated, just what I need.
A very simple mobile which is easy to set up and use. Easy to read keyboard. Ideal for older people with hearing and sight problems.

I'm an 85 year old gentleman, Purchased this phone to replace my current Doro phone..
As needed to have a phone with larger buttons for me to use.
Cannot fault this phone at all..It does exactly what is says on the tin!!

Would certainly recommend this phone to someone in my position...

The price for this phone is very good for someone on a tight budget..

Customer service was excellent in these challenging times...

Bought this for my elderly father, really easy to set up, put his SIM card in and worked straight away, he's really pleased with it, simple to use, nice big clear screen with adjustable text size, he's really happy with it
Easy to use phone. Nice large buttons .
This was bought for my husband who has trouble with the feeling in his fingers. He finds the buttons fantastic. Thanks

I got this dorro phone for my husband this is his second one like this he loves the phone nice size fits into a pocket not to big nice large buttons to use easy instructions for the phone good sound loudspeaker and volume all the basics you need l think it is a good all rounder phone comes nicely wrapped in box so as you can keep the charger inside till when you need it good battery life span nice graphic colour lovely looking phone very happy customer
My mother can youse the phone quite easy
Fantastic and simple phone for my husband to use, may even progress to texting
very nice phone for ellderly poeple
Bought for my elderly Man to replace her last one. She finds it very easy to use and it sounds excellent. Recommend.
Price was very good we have had phones from argos before value for money

Bought for a lady who isn't techno minded but needed a mobile to keep in contact with family and friends. 
She can easily manage to ring and text others.
The larger buttons and screen make it easy for her to see and use.

I am afraid Doro are heading towards the Ipad market which some of us of the older generation are a bit baffled with so prefer to stick to a basic big button easy to read big font mobile that lights up in the dark but fortunately Argos have older models in stock as well as the dancing, singing, and other fancy gadgets it has.  Was able to click and collect the next day from the local supermarket during the Covid-19 crisis.  FIRST ONE I HAVE HAD WITH A CAMERA!!!!

I purchased this phone for my mum who was struggling to use a smart phone and pleased to say that she now regularly calls me and feels a lot better knowing that she can call or text when she wants to rather than having to rely on my dad. So it's great for someone whose vision or dexterity is such that using a smart phone is problematic. Also good for someone looking for a simple phone for calling and texting.
Bought this simple phone for my elderly parents. They love it!
I bought this phone for my sister who has r arthritis. She says she finds it easy to grasp and use. Also, she doesn't have to charge it very often. Recommended.
Bought this mobile for an elderly lady in hospital. Who should be able to manage the limited  characteristics of this machine.
Excellent phone very easy to set up and use for any one not wanting the latest smart phone or has difficulty in using technology my elderly neighbour was very happy with it
Nice and easy to use very clear

the larger buttons are perfect for me and its a simple easy to use mobile with not to much going on, like being able to take photos which so far look good, the price was cheaper than a few other places I looked so very happy with purchase
Great size phone. Nice clear buttons. Great for an older person. Clear instructions. Very pleased.

Great phone for elderly easy to see and so easy to use does what it says calls an texts for the people that wants to have the basic calls texts camera and no worries about trying to get on to internet and keyboard is spaced out better

Bought for my 90 year old mum, exactly what was required. No frills; just a basic well designed phone. Used mainly for calls and occasional text. Very clear sound quality which is important for the user.
Can definitely recommend
This phone doro 1370 is superb and simple to use.

Bought for my elderly father who wanted a simple to use phone for making and receiving calls and receiving texts.  Buttons are big enough for him to use and the screen is large enough for him to see the wording.  You can enlarge the font which is ideal for him as he has eyesight problems.  He is particularly delighted with the added torch and camera features!  Excellent value for money.

This phone is sturdy and straight forward. The screen and font size is great and key spacing good when texting. It was easy to set up as the instructions were easy to follow. The phone itself is a good size too so it’s comfortable to hold for texting or making a call.

This is the perfect retro style mobile for anyone with hearing difficulties, the sound is clear and the volume can be easily adjusted, I find I can remove my hearing aid when using the phone and still have an easy conversation.
Just wanted a basic mobile phone for my parents and this fits the bill perfectly. They are very happy with it.
Simple low tech, does the job well. Only wished it made it clear or clearer it only takes 2g SIM card. Loud ringer and large font to read perfect for my father in his 80’s
No do's or don't at present. Easy to use
Fulfils it's purpose
It's okay for the money but its very disappointing that there isn't an mp3 option on it....
So nice and simple to use

The phone, though not a fancy one with lots of gizmos, is ideal for my 96 old mum, who is hard of hearing and suffers from arthritis. She can answer and make calls and doesn't worry about texts and taking photos.

I brought this as a sim free phone but when I put a 3 sim in it doesn’t work looking into settings it looks like you can only use Vodafone EE and O2 so is no good for me and I do not call this sim free and should be told before buying
Purchased the Duro 1370 for my 93 year old dad, very impressed easy to use does what it says and we have no regrets..

Phone great for my 81 year old mother as her exact phone broke and I needed to get the exact replacement so she knew how to use it. It was a lot more expensive than asda which cost £20 but they had non in stock
Great phone for the money. Very simple to use just the job for my technophobe husband who won't wear his reading glasses.
Ideal for an older phone user easy to operate and understand
Just perfect large buttons, clear sound. He very pleased with the phone. Thanks
Good for older folks with big fingers and poor eyesight. Be careful. Does not support 3G and above so does my work with some operators such as idmobile.
very easy to operrate and load to hear
I bought this for my elderly mum. As she couldn’t get on with a smartphone it doesn’t work on 3 or 4G only 2G . I’m going to have to return it . Shame as it would of been perfect for her
This is a great size for sight impaired or elderly people. It has some great features such as camera, torch etc that are all easy to use and the price was fantastic
This was a gift for my mom who is 81 yrs old. Really easy to use, screen good size and functions are easy too.

This was purchased for my visually impaired husband; however, after setting up the phone, it doesn't charge properly and displays the message 'battery error' making the phone unusable. Hence the 1-star rating.

Will contact manufacturer to see if replacement battery can be sent, otherwise phone will have to be returned.

Also, my husband says the buttons on the phone are too small for him to use easily.
very happy with Doro phone. easy to set up
Great size, great visibilty on the screen and easy to use.
Bought for elderly aunt.....perfect.

Bought for my Dad who's really old Nokia had finally given up the ghost! Being of the older generation he struggles with his mobile, so needed something really simple and this has ticked all the boxes... bigger screen, bigger letter, bigger buttons.
Dont know what the battery life is like, as he hasnt had it long but he seems very happy with this phone and can actually use it, so all a positive. He only needs it for phone calls n texting, so if that's what you need this phone for, its ideal
This is a fabulous phone, great for techno phones like myself! Easy to use, great display great tunes choice, everything you need! Highly recommend

Bought this for my 89 year old father-in-law. He only uses his phone for texting and calls and this phone is perfect. No fancy stuff to get bamboozled with. The phone fits comfortably in the hand, the buttons are large and positive to the touch. You can get very large text on the screen and the ring tones are as loud as you could possibly want. All this at a very reasonable price. Perfect! Thank you Doro for being brave enough to design a phone that no teenager would want to be seen dead with.
A very simple easy to use phone. With good functions. My nan was very worried when she had to get a new mobile but has found this one fairly easy to use. Good price too.
Bought for my wife, very easy to operate, just the thing as she doesn’t like any bells and whistles
Very happy with this  phone light weight , good if you just won't to phone or text . I'm 65 it good and simple or the over 60.

This is product was bought for my dad. He has disabilities and allows him to use his mobile readily and easily when contacting me. 

An easy to use phone, which I would recommend.
Good mobile it's basic but works verry well battery life is excellent lasts a week easy to see screen and easy to use
This phone is easy to use..  Perfect for all the basics.

love This phone it’s simple , lightweight and easy to use. I use it for my business and mum answers the phone a lot of the time and isn’t very good with smart phones so this is ideal for her. 
Recommend 100 per cent
My sister would benefit from a louder a ringtone but the contrast of a white phone with black buttons is very helpful. The battery life is great!
battery needs charging too frequently otherwise o.k.

I bought this for my husband who wanted a simple, east to use phone.
The keyboard features are straightforward, the screen is quite large and easy to read.
It has a basic camera.
Over all he is delighted with it.
This phone is easy to use and great for my elderly mother
Does what it says on the box, no frills
Good to go does what it says
This phone is excellent very easy to use bought for my husband who is not technically minded at all. He found it so easy to use in comparison to his old phone. Would certainly Recommend this phone
Very easy to use display very clear, ringtones loud definitely full recommend
Fab phone for my elderly Dad. He knows how to operste this one. It has large numbers and is easy to use

This is a fabulous phone for the elderly who want a phone to text and make calls. Good screen, easy to use, user friendly, with added extras. My dad who I bought it for is well impressed and very happy with it.

I haven't had the phone long but l bought it as I wanted a simple phone with radio for travelling as I also have a tablet l can use for wider use.
    So far it fits the bill and I am happy with it.!
A mobile phone for an elderly relative
this phone is so simple to use nothing fancy just calls and text camera could use more memory though

I got this phone for my mother who couldn't use a smart phone any more. it's easy to use nice big buttons and a very user friendly interface. would highly recommend for anyone but very useful for those who want a simple phone. it also uses the nano sim size so if transfering from an old phone to this one it's easy to copy contacts on to sim card and then use it accordingly.
Easy to use phone or technophobe. Big buttons. Straightforward text entry.

This little phone looks really good and has all the basics most people would need, this replaced another Doro that doesn't has a camera or sd card slot and although the user will not be taking photos it does have a basic camera which is good for snapping the odd letter to send and have an opinion on. I like these Doro phones because they have a panic button on and are easy to use for the elderly parents.
A great phone easy to use and setup

Have turned my back on touch screen phones, have returned to traditional cell phone, easy to use, no complicated camera or evasive apps/notifications. Nice looking phone screen larger than i thought has a basic camera that i will probably never have need for, purchased a case .  Main features : Light durable phone, Nice colour, Unlocked , reliable.
Only negative is battery life could be a little better, however is still ahead of my previous android phone. Very pleased with my purchase.
Very easy to use, larger buttons, good sized screen, perfect for partially blind person, would definatly reccomemend great price also user friendly
delivery good an on time pleased with the product Good large buttons on key pad to accommodate my fat fingers !!

I had given my iPhone to my Dad and he was struggling to use it and hear it. This phone does everything he needs - makes and receives calls easily and at decent volume. It was irritating to have to manually enter the phone numbers.
Good: Clear, bright screen, shortcuts to 10 favourite numbers, loud volume
Bad: Soft-keys at the top left and right change their function depending on what you are doing. This is a bit defeating. Short power cable on mains adapter.

Excellent phone
But only seems to work with EE Vodafone and O2
 ie certainly not ID Mobile sim only
very ease to use good value

Bought this phone for my mother who is not yet ready for a smartphone!  It's fab - Clear, precise buttons.  Large, clear screen and some fab features such as a torch, camera, ICE details.  She is very happy with it.  Not sure about battery life yet as she's only had it a couple of days, but she's had a DORO phone previously and the battery on that was great.
Very easy to use and a good price but just not quite loud enough for my eldely Father even on Hearing Aid setting.
If you want a clear, easy to use basic phone - maybe as a second, or emergency phone, or for an elderly relative, or you just don't need a smartphone - then this could be just the ticket.

I bought this for my 77-year-old neighbour who needed a simple phone without gimmicks. This is her first phone, and although she was terrified of learning how to use it, she's had it a week now and loves the big keys, easy to read screen, and simplicity of it. Highly recommended for elderly people who have never had a mobile phone before, or anyone who just wants a simple phone that calls and texts.
Good small phone, easy to see and use large buttons and sim free.

Second of these phones for my elderly mother .
Easy to use
Good volume
All in all a great little phone for the price

A great phone for those who may be struggling with smaller screens or buttons. Bought this for my dad who doesn't do smart phones and he finds it much easier to use than his previous one. Great battery life too!

Great size phone with easy to use and read buttons. I have arthritic hands and can hold and use the phone with ease. The display is also a good size and easy to see.
Logical functions and a great feature of being able to input top 10 used numbers for one button recall to ring. Also has an SOS button that will ring your chosen number automatically when pushed. 
Although new, great battery life so far and my SIM card fitted no problem.
Bought for my partner who has parkinsons and bad eyesight. Finds it simple to use and ease of access buttons on the front makes this phone one of the best in its class !
It is a great phone as you have a part to put emergency contacts and problem in, idea for people that don't have great memories
Bought for my 95year old mother mainly for the SOS button. Easy to set up and use, no mobile data, but would be ideal to keep in the glove box as it has a long battery life.
Simple phone for calls and txts

Got this phone for my dad as he's getting on a bit now and his eyesight is failing and he really can't get along with a smart phone(touch screen). This has a really clear screen and buttons large enough for him to be able to navigate around no problem. One really good feature is an emergency button on the rear of the phone that if pressed sounds an alarm and calls an emergency contact(which is setup by the user), this is great for my dad as he is prone to falls.

All I needed was a straight forward phone and I got it with the Doro 1370. I do not need to carry a computer around in my back pocket as I have a computer and i-pad at home to use. The Doro 1370 is very easy to set up and use straight out of the box. It is well made with a clear large screen and the sound and spoken word is very clear. The Doro was from Argos and was sim-free and unlocked, so in went my sim and the Doro fired up and away we went. I did buy a leather cover for the phone.
Bought this for an elderly person. Large buttons stand out against white background and menu is easy to follow
Big buttons, easy set upo - good for an elderly mother with limited tech savvie!

Brought for my elderly mother she loves this phone 
Great service from Argos
The phone was easy to set up and works well for people with sight problems
this is very easy to use phone. I love it . Good price. Good battery life I must say. Hope this helps.

Easy to use and to setup very quick.
Very good for grandad or grandma. Easy to see the display and use buttons.
A great phone for my elderly mother. Simple to set up, great battery life and the great thing is the assistance button in case of emergencies. Me and my mother are extremely pleased with this phone.

Bought this for my Mum who can't text or use a smart phone although I did try to teach her. Gave up and bought this phone and it's a winner. Its easy to use, has big buttons the screen is large and really clear and the battery lasts ages.
Large and easy to set up for people of all ages

Great basic ,but well made phone .
Easy to use , read , loud ringtone. 
Feels light but strough.

Great phone for older people. 
Easy to use.

The phone has clear, simple to understand and straightforward displays; medium size and easy to use keyboard; adequate but straightforward features. An excellent purchase for someone who does not require or want all the complicated and expensive additional features. Excellent value for money.
Same as anything in life you get what you pay for cheap and cheerful phone does the job it’s meant to do
Perfect gift for elderly and visually challenged or disabled adults.
Big keys makes texting easy and large screen is easy to read.
Got this phone for my grandad. Great easy to use.

My mother in law is 87 , and loves this phone .she is not technically minded and it purely for phone calls only ( no texting ).

Perfect product for the elderly, speedy service from Argos and a cheap price .

Very happy
Wonderful easy phone to use especially for an 85 year old lady and would recommend it especially for its simplicity.
Got this for my Dad who is elderly and didn't want a fussy phone. It does exactly what it should do, making and receiving calls. I would definetly recommend this phone to older people.
My elderly mother thinks its great

I got this phone for my elderly parents for emergencies when they are out. The phone looks like a calculator! It’s basic which is what I wanted for them. I put £10 credit on it and my dad didn’t realise he was sitting on it and it obviously called a number I had set in to phone book and while £10 credit gone!
I got this because of the reviews, but honestly don’t waste your money

Features large text for poor eyesight high volume for hard of hearing and you can input medical details about person ideal for people with dementia etc ...
Also has a sos button where you can input 2 numbers the phone will call when the button is pressed .
Very simple and easy to use menu.

The phone is a good price for what it is .. the big buttons and sound quality for my grandmas friend was the selling point for me,  well made too. If anybody wants to buy this for their gran or other elderly relatives then it’s the one for you and them.
Bought for 85 year old and she has mastered without a problem. It was her first mobile so no expert. Great purchase.
Great design and ideal for my 70yr old mom
Very good value for money and easy to set up and use, recommended.

Slightly bigger than normal easy to handle
Clear layout. Great little camera a d torch very handy.  Brilliant phone for the price

Bought 2 for both of my parents, it is very easy to use and set up. This was the first mobile my dad has had at 80 years old, and he could ring me easily. Battery lasts a long time, and very good size for anyone who has poor eyesight.
Excellent size and simple to use functions, ideal for older/senior age groups due to easy to use lay out, operation, clear display & large fonts
Ideal phone if you don’t want anything complicated and if your eye sight isn’t great
Bought for 86 year old, just right, simple easy to use,
Perfect basic easy to use mobile phone. Purchased this phone for my hubby that didn’t want a fancy do everything phone. So easy to use with clear text and very easy to use buttons.
Bought for a family member who is delighted with it lovely sound screen is a good size easy to use another satisfied customer thank you made a perfect Christmas present
Bought as a gift for my daddy with sight problems and its brilliant, large writing for texting and reading also large keypad and very easy to use 10/10

Bought 2 of these recently for my mum and her friend, both elderly not wanting any whistles and bells but just a bigger, clear phone simple to use. It’s an improvement on the last one as it’s got a camera so that’s handy. Just perfect for anyone not wanting anything other than to ring or text and take a picture.

The product description needs to highlight that this mobile operates from a 2G sim card, it was not until we purchased the wrong card and purchased credit on a pay as you go scheme for my elderly mother that we found the very small print - it should be the first sentence. Not all network providers have 2G cards.
Very good mobile phone

Very happy with my new phone
Very easy to use and exactly what I need it for
Easy to use, good for someone not wanting a phone with apps. Simple phone.
It is an excellent mobile recommended by Which I believe. However not suit able for all sizes of SIM cards.
Phone is great for my elderly partner easy to understand not to many features for him to understand
Very good phone and fast service , phone great and long battery life
Works well easy to use for my mother whose 79. Hates technology but can use this mobile. Especially speed dial..
Great design for mother in law with large buttons & screen plus nice touches including camera, torch and radio. Great value and perfect for her to communicate with the family.
Seemed to be ok. Got it for my Dad as he couldnt use his other phone. It has better sized screen and larger buttons.
Brilliant designed phone for my elderly neighbour. Big buttons enable her to operate the phone with ease.

Very pleased with this phone.  Well made, nice big screen that is wide, which makes reading text messages a lot easier.  Big, sturdy buttons and long battery life.  Highly recommended if you're wanting a talk and text kind of phone.
very good little phone I had some one in Hostpital for a while I gave here this phone she was over the moon very good
bought for my mother  big numbers and wide spaces for easy use ideal for elderly
An excellent simple phone with good size keys and good battery life. Idea for elderly relatives who don’t need internet connection.
Rally handy this phone has helped the elderly be independent due to poor hearing and poor sight the battery last long
I bought this phone for a friend who finds other mobile phones challenging  but this phone is easy to use and they are very happy with it...
Great phone for the elderly with the sos feature where they can set family members to call in a emergency by pressing the sos button really excellent
Bought for my elderly father. It’s great. Easy to use, easy for him to see and just an all round fantastic phone, especially for the price.

Brought for my dad, he struggles to use a more modern phone. He only needs it for emergencies, the black buttons stand out against the white body making it easy for him to see. Bigger buttons which help him lots. A great phone for the money, so far so good.
If you want a no frills phone you cannot beat this phone

I purchased this for my 76 year husband who has never owned a mobile and was adamant he would never use one. He was in hospital when I purchased it after reading a review saying how simple it was to use. Its back in it's box now until he has to go back into hospital but he is thrilled with it and the family were so pleased we could contact him whenever we wanted to.

I chose this phone for an elderly lady on the basis of price and functionality. It has a larger screen than her previous tiny flip phone which has made a huge difference navigating around. 
Simple features for phone and texting usage.
I bought this for an elderly relative. It’s perfect. Easy to use, clear display and not too big.
Brilliant gift for a technology novice!
This phone is ideal for people who find some other mobiles more complicated.

Good basic phone, with a clear display. Let down by poor battery life (with 10/20 txts per day - I was charging every two days maximum). Similar ALLLLBBBBBAAAAAA phone that I had, had a battery that lasted noticeably longer. Returned for a refund.
really simple to use, excellent basic phone good camera, feels good and solid in the hand I also love the simplicity of the design. would highly recommend.

My mother is in her late 80s, and is a bit of a technophobe. She does however like to have a mobile phone, and needed a new one to replace her old Nokia which had given up the ghost. This phone is almost perfect...almost. Really easy to use, almost like a basic old Nokia. One criticism is that the text and ringing alert volume could do with being quite a lot louder, as could the call volume. My mother can hear it just OK (she wears hearing aids), but I imagine this could be an issue for some.

Bought for my father in law as he was struggling with a smart phone he is very happy with this as all he needs it for is to receive and make calls. Please be aware that while this phone is SIM free, SIM cards from the 3 network do not work as the phone is only 2G, I had this confined by 3, their SIM cards are only for 3G upwards.
Look good, the instructions seem fairly clear, so fingers crossed that an amateur like me can use it to it's full benefit.
A great phone for my 85 year old mother very easy to use and large enough buttons to deal with dexterity problems

As a replacement for my failed original basic phone, this is excellent, but don't expect very smart attributes, as it is just a phone with texting ability.
It is very well made and robust enough to survive everyday use.

- which doeas all the basics well. For me, it's important that I like the graphics, font and ringtone, and this phone ticks all those boxes. One drawback is that the smallest font size is a bit too big.
Bought phone for my 91 year old mum. It works brilliantly and is especially good for hard of hearing as you can enhance the volume. Easy to set up and use.
bought this phone as i only needed a basic model but it has some nice features and looks good
Bought this phone for my grandma who is 84. This phone is really easy to use and has a long battery life. The buttons are bright and big and easy to see.
Got this for my elderly Mum, she finds it easy to use

Got this for my dad who just wanted a basic phone. Big buttons, easy menu system and clear screen with text that can be easily read plus a loud ring. Added to this is the emergency button which when pressed and held automatically rings and texts one of a preset list of numbers, if the first doesn’t answer it rings the next, etc. until someone does answer. Great for older people on their own.

It's nice to handle and use, but sound quality isn't great and battery life is poor. I'd also like the power button to be somewhere other than the hangup button as it's too easily powered off by my dad with dementia.
I bought this phone for my mother and it is I nice simple phone for her to use. It is simple to set up and use

My wife is going into hospital Friday for a replacement shoulder, I wanted a phone that she could use with limited arm movement, after looking at reviews I chose this phone, she has got on well so far, I'm sure she will be ok
Simple to use good value for money
Great device good features
Bought as a spare phone for a relative who is technophobe.  Nothing fancy and easy to use.

Fantastic little phone, great for people with reduced vision. The buttons are big enough, the text on the user interface is adjustable which is a plus, the emergency dial button on the back is great too! An ideal purchase for my disabled father!
The phone suits my purpose as I wanted a gadget free phone just to make and receive calls.

Bought the phone for an elderly relative.
She has found it very easy to use and is excellent as it can store important contact numbers in case of emergency. .
A must buy and a great price too .
It is an update of the previous model and a lot easier to hold and see
Brilliant, bigger than I thought but easy to use
Bought this for my elderly father who wouldn’t have been able to cope with anything but a basic phone. Good product for him, easy to use and all the basic functions of a phone 15 years ago

I bought this for a family member who is visually impaired. This type of the Doro phones has a bigger screen, although I wish they would not show the mobile provider's info on the screen as it confuses him with other text. 

for some they might find the Doro that opens and closes more classier- though slightly more expensive. I needed something affordable but also with a bigger screen.

Exactly as required. Easy to use, no frills (hence features markdown) but what's there works well and shouldn't put you off buying if you are just looking for a simple phone for calls and texts. Just note: it requires a network SIM that is compatible with 2G (this excludes the UK 3 network)
The phone was a replacement for the first mobile I bought my 82 year old Mum. She loves it and now we're getting rid of her landline. Win ... win.
Easy to set up and easy to use.
Really easy to use and looks brilliant.
Simple to understand
Good product excellent description good value for money. I would definately recommend this fone.

Once set up this is a fairly easy to use phone. The instructions do not cover everything. For instance finding how to lock the Key board (essential) is a bit trial and error. If you or someone you love needs a simple phone this could be the one.

Has only has up/down buttons (which work as forward/back  Needs left/right buttons to allow editing of informtiion rather than having to clear/delete and re-enter - also a little bit "fat" in the hand when trying to enter numbers/names single-handedly, would be better if narrower.
My mum found this easy to use as she couldn't quite use smart phones. Lare buttons so easier to type. Great basic phone.
Really pleased with it.

Hubby not at all tech-savvy and just wants a phone that is easy to use, easy to see and behaves like a phone rather than a mini computer.  The Doro fulfills all of those criteria and he's on his fourth or fifth now.  Bought one for my elderly parents as well, they love it.
Fantastic little phone
Excellent. Very easy to use. Keys large enough to be seen.
This was phone was bought for my husband who just wanted a simple phone and this is ideal he very pleased .
Easy to use phone with large clear keys

I found this phone excellent has we brought it for my Mother in Law, who’s not tech minded and found out herself how to use the phone. Also a bonus the instructions were easy to follow.
I would buy this phone again and recommend it to family and friends.
This phone has let us help mum who has dementia and it has all important info on for her.

This is a really good phone for the elderly or anyone who wants a no nonsense phone . Very easy to set up with a built in guide. Having a slight technical problem with it but Doro are sorting that out . All in all a great basic phone
Just wanted a phone for only calls and text that has clearly defined reasonably-sized  keys and easy to use. This phone fits the bill exactly for a very reasonable price.
So. Easy to understand and use. Very reasonably priced.. Just wish the phone part could be adjusted to be louder on incoming calls.
Good features,easy to use,long life battery.

ideal size easy to follow  information  I am  delighted with my DORO .
Great service , quick delivery from Argos

.
Brought this for my elderly uncle to use its easy and straight  forward for him to get on with
This phone was bought for my elderly father it is very good for him because it has a clear display and is easy to operate would recommend for any older person very easy to set up and understand
Simple to use..mum will b able to use easier than normal sized keys.
Battery lasted a week. Has shortcut buttons for favourites, flashlight, camera.
I brought this for my nan that can't hear that well    or see that good and she can use it without any problems.

Needed a phone quickly and no interest in smart phone and this one  met my needs perfectly.. Camera good but texting can be a bind . Good phone but if I had had more time I might have found something a little better but on the whole good phone for the price.

I bought this for my mum. Easy to use and a good size screen. 
I like the emergency button feature

My elderly uncle's dated phone broke and he wanted a reasonably priced replacement and to keep his credit and contacts.  I purchased the Doro 1370 for him and he's delighted with it.  It looks good and is very easy to use.  Would definitely recommend this product.
Buttons a good size.
He found it very easy and simply to use... loving it.

This is our second Doro phone, it has much better voice clarity than my iPhone. Everything on this phone is logical to use and is very easily customisable. The keyboard is actually visible without specs! this includes composing a text message, wow!
As I said in the review title, this is not just for "oldies" Buy and enjoy using it.

David
simple and friendly to use
very good quality phone .I am very happy with my new phone, much stronger and louder than my  old one, very very pleased with my purchase.
The Doro has been good, but this one the.Doro 1370 does not come up to the past standard. Very disappointed.
Easy to set up and operate
Had 'basic' mobile phones for 30 years. I can say this is by far the best one. Every function is quick and you can read the screen in sunlight.

IT HAS USEFUL FEATURES.
LARGE KEYS MAKE IT EASY TO USE.
LARGE PRINT MAKES IT EASY TO READ
Good quality does everything on the box
Bought this phone for my elderly parents great phone as it has bigger buttons ideal shape and size , would definitely recommend as it’s a great price too
A fantastic phone for my dad

Very easy phone to use 
Simple menu ,good size keys and font size 
Very clear calls and good camera 
A breath of fresh air in this smart phone madness
Good easy to use phone with excellent safety features, ideal for non technical users.
